references.reason: This paper introduces the core denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs) which are central to the proposed SampDetox method.

references.paper_title: Badnets: Identifying vulnerabilities in the machine learning model supply chain
references.reason: This paper introduces the BadNets backdoor attack, which serves as a crucial baseline and benchmark for evaluating the SampDetox defense method.
This survey paper provides a comprehensive overview of backdoor attacks and defenses, providing context and background for the SampDetox work.

references.paper_title: Neural cleanse: Identifying and mitigating backdoor attacks in neural networks
references.reason: This paper introduces Neural Cleanse, a significant prior defense method against backdoor attacks, which SampDetox improves upon.

references.paper_title: Black-box backdoor defense via zero-shot image purification
references.reason: This paper proposes ZIP, another important prior defense method against backdoor attacks, with which SampDetox is compared.
